descriptions: ['DescriptionIf you have always dreamed of living right on one of the best beaches in the world, reality can trump your dream at Jumeirah Beach Residence. Located just south Dubai Marina, JBR sits right on Arabian Gulf. It was designed to become one of the Middle East’s premier residential and vacation spots and it hasn’t let its initial target down! Beachfront cafes, world-class hotels, delightful shopping experience, excellent walking environment are here to entertain you.\nThis community is vibrant and dynamic both night and day, thanks to its key feature, a beautiful stretch of beach, that runs parallel to the community and includes parking, retail, and food options; in addition, The Walk at JBR is a series of restaurants, cafes, retail shops, beauty salons, and other convenience outlets built on the ground floor level of the residential towers\nThe swimming pools and gym are on the plaza level access, with the security entrance and access to retails shops, restaurants, and supermarkets, others']

descriptions: ['DescriptionMovie in after one year in this semi-detached villa in Akoya Oxygen and Enjoy the spacious layout of this unique semi detached villa.\xa0Close to the city, yet away from the congestion. At the heart of nature AKOYA Oxygen melts away the hustle and bustle of urban life with an ecosystem that is unique in every way. Only 25 min from the center of the city along the Umm Suqeim Expressway, this breathtaking community offers a carefully designed master plan & road network system, with dedicated spaces for bicycles & hybrids. \xa0Energy-efficient homes are surrounded by enchanting lush greenery and cascading water features. This is luxury un-imagined. This unparalleled development provides luxury living on a grand scale, with over 2,000 hotel apartments of varying size, all offering exceptional views of the development, the lake and the lush fairways of the Trump World Golf Club Dubai. Imagine waking up to stunning views across lush fairways, perfectly manicured greens and rich planting, sprinkled with streams and water features.The villas at AKOYA Oxygen are supremely designed to offer a living experience that appreciates the beauty of the natural environment, with breathtaking outdoor amenities complementing the luxury homes.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are delighted to offer this Mediterranean / European style family mansion within the prestigious HT sector of Exclusive Emirates Hills.
With a wrap around garden, bbq area and lagoon style swimming pool, this is really a home to be proud of.
Inside the villa is a double height entrance with impressive chandelier, 3 huge living areas (ideal for entertaining) and 2 kitchens (one of them a prep kitchen). There are also 7 over sized bedrooms to choose from! The staircase and entrance hall are magnificent and there is also an elevator already in place going from the basement all the way up to the upstairs bedrooms!
In the basement of this home is a fully fitted nightclub with disco lights and DJ set for those who like to entertain. Alternatively, if this is not your style- the space can easily be transformed into a home cinema.
This property has been reduced recently and is priced at land cost only. This is certainly one of the nicest, and most sensibly priced houses on the market today.

For further details or to arrange a viewing appointment please contact our Head Office on +9714294444, alternatively visit our website www.allsoppandallsopp.com where you will find an extensive selection of properties available both for sale and for rent.
Please call Rachel Stephens on +971544473078 for more information or to arrange a viewing.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionAllsopp and Allsopp are delighted to bring to market this stunning upgraded Family Villa in GC East.
- Beautifully Upgraded
- 6,210 Sq. Ft. BUA
- 8,426 Sq. Ft. PLOT
- 5 Large Bedrooms with Ensuites
- Detached Maid’s Room
- Landscaped Garden
- Vacant on Transfer
- Agent: Ben Perry on +971503855736 (RERA BRN No.: 31806)
The villa was repainted externally in 2018 with highest quality Benjamin Moore paints.
All doors, skirting frames and arches are custom and painted white. The staircase is custom built and solid wood.
Ricci Milan Kitchen complete with custom island, Corian counter tops and new Corian sinks, subway tile and kitchen tape set.
The house has been installed with Alumi Parquet Flooring. Total upgrades and inclusions are worth around AED 560,000.
This villa is close proximity to the community shops, restaurants and Mariott Hotel. The metro which is expected to finish by March 2020 will be linked to Sheikh Zayed Road. Added to the reputable schools make this a perfect family home.
Property Ref. No.: DUB170196']
